creditline: Gift of Sanford H. Roth, Transfer from the Record Book Collection
description: Picasso, wearing a sweater, shirt and tie, and holding a cap and a cigarette, in front of a sculpture of a girl; bottles in LRC; window behind sculpture
inscription:
Inscription and Stamp

on back, in pencil: [P. Picasso], [Gift of Sanford H. Roth / 11/23/54 / RB54.1 (1)] and [L54.182.2]
markings: on back, stamped in red: [THIS PHOTOGRAPH / NOT FOR REPRODUCTION / WITHOUT WRITTEN AUTHORIZATION / Sanford H. Roth]
title: Pablo Picasso in his rue des Grands Studio, Paris
